label: 衛士府
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: the Headquarters of the Royal Palace Guards, whose members guarded the gates of the tennô’s residential palace. It was renamed the Headquarters of the Royal Gate Guards (Emonfu 衛門府) after 811. [天皇]
